text: As of 2015, Tirukkural has been translated into Dutch only once. ==History of translations== Selections of Tirukkural couplets were translated into the Dutch language by D. Kat in 1964. This is the only Dutch translation of the Kural text known thus far. ==Translations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text-align:center; width:25%;"|Translation !Kural, couplet or verse, No. 315 (Chapter 32, Niet kwaad doen) |- | style="text-align:center;"|D. Kat, 1964||Wat heb je aan kennis als het je er niet toe brengt de pijn van anderen te voorkomen, als was het je eigen pijn? |} ==See also== * Tirukkural translations * List of Tirukkural translations by language == Notes == Dutch Category:Translations into Dutch
title: Tirukkural translations into Dutch
